settings.title: Doing Good
settings.text: We truly believe that it is not only our responsibility, but also our obligation to protect the world we are a part of and get to enjoy. Because of this, we are proudly part of the ‘1% For The Planet’ members’ and donate 1% of our gross revenue to a group of certified nonprofits

settings.title: Doing Better
settings.text: At Frankster, we are committed by doing better every day and reducing our footprint. We source locally, using certified materials and creating garments that are meant to last.

"We know our industry's eco-footprint is heavy, and we won't dress that up. While we aren't perfect, we're striving to lead by example. With ambitious goals and transparent progress, we invite you on our journey towards a greener future.”

"We do not change the fit & design of our garments, that's a promise we will keep. But that does not mean we don't improve the production methods and materials we use. All the materials we use are Oeko-Tex certified. The Oeko-Tex certification means that the textile is tested for harmful substances."

- Niels Hoeben, Founder of Frankster -

settings.title: Slow Fashion
settings.text: Our high-quality garments are made to last a long time, with timeless style that never goes out of fashion and a perfect fit that never changes. We never have overstock and we never incinerate our products. We don't offer promotions or discounts, and everything we make, will at some point, be worn by our customers. Some call this Slow Fashion, but we call it Feeling Good by Doing Good — for our consumer, our business, and our planet. That's a promise!
